member.name: M:Brevitee.Management.Bam.Scripts(System.Web.Mvc.WebViewPage,System.String)
member.summary: Gets script tags for all scripts pertaining to the specified appName.

member.name: M:Brevitee.Management.Bam.CommonConfigScripts(System.Web.Mvc.WebViewPage,System.Object)
member.summary: Get script tags that reference the scripts listed in the /bam/apps/config.js file

member.name: M:Brevitee.Management.Bam.AppConfigScripts(System.Web.Mvc.WebViewPage,System.Object)
member.summary: Get script tags that reference the scripts listed in the /bam/apps/{appName}/config.js file.

member.name: M:Brevitee.Management.Bam.AppScripts(System.Web.Mvc.WebViewPage,System.Object)
member.summary: Get script tags that reference scripts in the pages folder

member.name: M:Brevitee.Management.Bam.AppInitScript(System.Web.Mvc.WebViewPage,System.Object)
member.summary: Get a script tag that references the /bam/apps/{appName}/init.js script

member.name: M:Brevitee.Management.DesignController.LessBootstrapVariables(Brevitee.Management.ColorScheme)
member.summary: Saves the specified ColorScheme to ~/bam/json/colorscheme.json and returns the updated contents of variables.less
